attributes.action: All Convicted Rioters Should Do Community Service To Clean Up The Mess
attributes.additional_details: After the mess left behind by the Rioters in Our Cities, if convicted the should be made to do Community Service to help clean up the communities that they tried to destroy. Also be made to do a course they must complete on 'respect of others and their communities', after their community service has finished, along any other sentance our justice system feels justified. They need to help those people who's shops and homes were destroyed by their actions
